K12bsu007_u:2: evaṃ mayā śrutamekasamaye bhagavān sukhāvatyāṃ viharati sma mahatā bodhisattvasaṃghena
K12bsu007_u:3: sārdhaṃ - tadyathā avalokiteśvareṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāsthāmaprāptena
K12bsu007_u:4: ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkaṃbhinā ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
K12bsu007_u:5: kṣitigarbheṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena samantabhadreṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
K12bsu007_u:6: ākāśagarbheṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena vajrapāṇinā ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
K12bsu007_u:7: sarvabhayahareṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evaṃ sarvamaṅgaladhāriṇā ca bodhisattvena
K12bsu007_u:8: mahāsattvena sarvapuṇyalakṣaṇadhāriṇā ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena candrasūryatrailokyadhāriṇā
K12bsu007_u:9: ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvatīrthamaṅgaladhāriṇā ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
K12bsu007_u:10: maṃjuśriyā ca kumārabhūtena ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evaṃpramukhairbodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ / (Śmdv 94)
K12bsu007_u:11: atha khalvāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K12bsu007_u:14: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śatasahasraṃ pradakṣīṇīkṛtya sarvāṃśca tān sukhāvatīnivāsino bodhisattvān mahāsattvān śirasābhivandyaikānte nyaṣīdat
K12bsu007_u:16: śriyaṃ mahādevīṃ dṛṣṭā mahābrahmasvareṇāvalokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat /
K12bsu007_u:17: yaḥ kaścidavalokiteśvara rājā vā rājamātro vā bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā vā brāhmaṇakṣatriyaviṭśūdrā
K12bsu007_u:18: vā śriyā mahādevyā aṣṭottaraṃ śataṃ vimalaprakhyaṃ nāma stotraṃ dhārayiṣyanti tasya
K12bsu007_u:19: rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya viṣaye teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ sarvabhayetyupadravā praśamiṣyanti /
K12bsu007_u:22: tasya ca rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya gṛhe śrīrnivasiṣyati /
K12bsu007_u:23: atha te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā evaṃ vācamabhāṣanta /
K12bsu007_u:26: ye śriyā mahādevyā nāmadheyāni dhārayiṣyanti teṣāmapīmā guṇānuśaṃsā bhaviṣyanti /
K12bsu007_u:31: bhūtapūrvamavalokiteśvara atīte 'dhvani ratnasaṃbhavāyāṃ lokadhātau ratnakusumaguṇasāgaravaidūryakanakagirisuvarṇakāṃcanaprabhāsaśrīrnāma tathāgato loke udapādi /
K12bsu007_u:32: tasyāntike śriyā mahādevyā kuśalamūlamavaropitamanyeṣāṃ ca bahūnāṃ tathāgatānāmantike /
K12bsu007_u:33: imāni ca tathāgatanāmāni tasyāḥ śriyā mahādevyāḥ kuśalamūlavivṛddhisaṃpattikarāṇi /
K12bsu007_u:34: sadānubaddhānitāni śriyā mahādevyā yānīha samudḥritāni sarvapāpaharāṇi sarvakilviṣanāśanāni
K12bsu007_u:75: imāni tathāgatanāmāni satkṛtya dhārayitavyāni vācayitavyāni evaṃ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati /
K12bsu007_u:77: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ śrīmahādevī anāgate 'dhvani śrīmahāratnapratimaṇḍitāyāṃ lokadhātau tatra śrīmaṇiratnasambhavo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyak sambuddhaḥ
K12bsu007_u:79: (Śmdv 98) tatra ca lokadhātau sa eva tathāgata ālokakaro bhaviṣyati /
K12bsu007_u:80: te ca bodhisattvāstatra buddhakṣetre svayaṃprabhā bhaviṣyantyaparimitāyuṣaśca /
K12bsu007_u:82: ye ca bodhisattvāstatra buddhakṣetre upapatsyante sarve te padmakarkaṭikāsūpapatsyante /
K12bsu007_u:89: om sāvitrī dhātrī mātā caturvedaśrīḥ lakṣmīḥ bhūtamātā jayā vijayā gaṅgā sarvatīrthā
K12bsu007_u:90: sarvamaṅgalyā vimalanirmalakaraśrīḥ sarvapāpahantrī nirmadakarā candraśrīḥ sūryaśrīḥ
K12bsu007_u:92: padmālayā padmadharā padmāvatī anekaratnāṃśumālā dhanadā śvetā mahāśvetā śvetabhujā
K12bsu007_u:95: vividhavicitramaṇimaulidharā surūpā viśvarūpā yaśā mahāyaśā saumyā bahujīmūtā pavitrakeśā
K12bsu007_u:96: candrakāntā sūryakāntā śubhā śubhakartrī sarvasattvābhimukhī āryākusumaśrīḥ kusumeśvarā
K12bsu007_u:100: dātrī bhoktrī tejā tejovatī vibhūtīḥ samṛddhiḥ vivṛddhiḥ unnatiḥ dharmaśrīḥ mādhavāśrayā
K12bsu007_u:101: kusumanilayā anasūyā puruṣakārāśrayā sarvapavitragātrā maṅgalahastā sarvālakṣmīnāśayitrī
K12bsu007_u:103: dyutiḥ pramodabhāgyalolā sarvarṣipavitraśrīḥ sarvaśrīḥ bhavajyeṣṭhottamaśrīḥ sarvakinnarasarvasūryottamaśrīḥ
K12bsu007_u:105: om vilokaya tāraya mocaya mama sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ sarvapuṇyasambhārānāmukhīkuru svāhā /
K12bsu007_u:114: om nigrigrini sarvakāryasādhani sini sini āvāhayāmi
K12bsu007_u:128: imāni tānyabhayāvalokiteśvaraśriyā mahādevyā nāmāni sarvakilviṣanāśanāni sarvapāpavidhvaṃsanakarāṇi
K12bsu007_u:130: yaḥ kaścidvārayiṣyati imāni tathāgatanāmāni kalyamutthāya śucinā sarvabuddhānāṃ puṣpadhūpaṃ
K12bsu007_u:131: dattvā śriyai mahādevyai candanadhūpaṃ dattvā vācayitavyāni sarvaśriyamadhigamiṣyati
K12bsu007_u:135: sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan //
